server.tools
Class Scheduler

java.lang.Object
  server.tools.Scheduler

public class Scheduler
extends java.lang.Object

A tool for managing scheduled Runnable events.

Since:
alpha
Version:
1.0
Author:
tomato

runOnce

public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> runOnce(java.lang.Runnable command,
                                                       long delay)
Runs an event one time after a set delay.

Parameters:
command - the Runnable to be executed
delay - the delay after which to execute the command
Returns:
a ScheduledFuture representing pending completion of the task

scheduleNow

public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> scheduleNow(java.lang.Runnable command,
                                                           long period)
Schedules an event to be executed periodically, starting immediately.

Parameters:
command - the Runnable to be executed
period - the period between executions of the command
Returns:
a ScheduledFuture representing pending completion of the task

schedule

public java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture<?> schedule(java.lang.Runnable command,
                                                        long initialDelay,
                                                        long period)
Schedules an event to be executed periodically, after an initial delay.

Parameters:
command - the Runnable to be executed
initialDelay - the delay before the command is first executed
period - the period between executions of the command
Returns:
a ScheduledFuture representing pending completion of the task

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Completes all running events and shuts down the ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.

public static Scheduler getInstance()
